trans-unit.source: Detailed Calculation

seg-source.mrk: Detailed Calculation

trans-unit.source: Detailed calculations are handled through the BoQ Budget Calculation page, which is essentially the same as the Job Budget Calculation page but with additional functions for Construction Works Processing. This page is opened from the Job Card by clicking Budget Calculation or from the BoQ Position List by clicking BoQ Budget Calculation.

seg-source.mrk: Detailed calculations are handled through the BoQ Budget Calculation page, which is essentially the same as the Job Budget Calculation page but with additional functions for Construction Works Processing.
This page is opened from the Job Card by clicking Budget Calculation or from the BoQ Position List by clicking BoQ Budget Calculation.

trans-unit.source: : BoQ Budget Calculation

seg-source.mrk: : BoQ Budget Calculation

trans-unit.source: BoQ Budget Calculation Page

seg-source.mrk: BoQ Budget Calculation Page

trans-unit.source: Many of the fields on the BoQ Budget Calculation page are the same as fields in the BoQ Position List. Therefore, only the fields that are specific to the BoQ Calculation are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: Many of the fields on the BoQ Budget Calculation page are the same as fields in the BoQ Position List.
Therefore, only the fields that are specific to the BoQ Calculation are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Allocated Quantity to PaC

seg-source.mrk: Allocated Quantity to PaC

trans-unit.source: Indicates the quantity assigned to a PaC Job.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the quantity assigned to a PaC Job.

trans-unit.source: Allocated Sales Line Amount to PaC

seg-source.mrk: Allocated Sales Line Amount to PaC

trans-unit.source: Indicates the Sales Line Amount assigned to a PaC Job.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the Sales Line Amount assigned to a PaC Job.

trans-unit.source: Allocated Total Cost to PaC

seg-source.mrk: Allocated Total Cost to PaC

trans-unit.source: Indicates the Total Cost assigned to a PaC Job.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the Total Cost assigned to a PaC Job.

trans-unit.source: Allocation Status

seg-source.mrk: Allocation Status

trans-unit.source: Indicates the status of allocation. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the status of allocation.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: None – used if the allocation is completely removed.

seg-source.mrk: None – used if the allocation is completely removed.

trans-unit.source: Partially – used if the complete quantity is not assigned.

seg-source.mrk: Partially – used if the complete quantity is not assigned.

trans-unit.source: Complete – used if the complete quantity is assigned.

seg-source.mrk: Complete – used if the complete quantity is assigned.

trans-unit.source: Amendment Type

seg-source.mrk: Amendment Type

trans-unit.source: Indicates the type of amendment. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the type of amendment.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Amendment

seg-source.mrk: Amendment

trans-unit.source: Decrease

seg-source.mrk: Decrease

trans-unit.source: Increase

seg-source.mrk: Increase

trans-unit.source: Assigned PaC Job No.

seg-source.mrk: Assigned PaC Job No.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the Pac Job which is assigned to the Job Line.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the Pac Job which is assigned to the Job Line.

trans-unit.source: Exp. Alloy Price (p. B. U.) FF

seg-source.mrk: Exp.
Alloy Price (p. B. U.) FF

trans-unit.source: Indicates the expected Alloy Price per Base Unit of Measure, which is calculated based on the selected item and the alloy quotation.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the expected Alloy Price per Base Unit of Measure, which is calculated based on the selected item and the alloy quotation.

trans-unit.source: The actions on the Actions tab that are related to the BoQ Calculation are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The actions on the Actions tab that are related to the BoQ Calculation are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Action

seg-source.mrk: Action

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Copy to

seg-source.mrk: Copy to

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire position line in the BoQ Budget Calculation; used with the “Paste from” function.

seg-source.mrk: Copies the entire position line in the BoQ Budget Calculation; used with the “Paste from” function.

trans-unit.source: Paste from

seg-source.mrk: Paste from

trans-unit.source: Pastes the copied position line to a new position in the BoQ Budget Calculation; used with the “Copy to” function.

seg-source.mrk: Pastes the copied position line to a new position in the BoQ Budget Calculation; used with the “Copy to” function.

trans-unit.source: Copy Calculation

seg-source.mrk: Copy Calculation

trans-unit.source: Opens the BoQ Position List page, where new job budget lines can be copied to a single position or multiple positions to reduce manual entry of the same item/service on other budget lines.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the BoQ Position List page, where new job budget lines can be copied to a single position or multiple positions to reduce manual entry of the same item/service on other budget lines.

trans-unit.source: Change Calculation Status

seg-source.mrk: Change Calculation Status

trans-unit.source: Opens the Calculation Status dialog, which allows for the change of Calculation Status for the selected position(s).

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Calculation Status dialog, which allows for the change of Calculation Status for the selected position(s).

trans-unit.source: Set BoQ Position No.

seg-source.mrk: Set BoQ Position No.

trans-unit.source: Creates a BoQ Position No. for current position and substructure or all positions based on the OZ Mask field from the Job Card.

seg-source.mrk: Creates a BoQ Position No.
for current position and substructure or all positions based on the OZ Mask field from the Job Card.

seg-source.mrk: Calculate Alloy Surcharges

trans-unit.source: Calculates the Alloy Surcharges for the entire job.

seg-source.mrk: Calculates the Alloy Surcharges for the entire job.

trans-unit.source: Calculate Rate Unit Cost

seg-source.mrk: Calculate Rate Unit Cost

trans-unit.source: Opens the Calc. Rate Unit Cost dialog, which is used to calculate the price parts for Unit Prices and Unit Costs.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the <span class="Bold">Calc.
Rate Unit Cost dialog, which is used to calculate the price parts for Unit Prices and Unit Costs.

trans-unit.source: Wage Group Change

seg-source.mrk: Wage Group Change

trans-unit.source: Opens the Wage Group Change dialog, which is used to adjust service costs.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Wage Group Change dialog, which is used to adjust service costs.

trans-unit.source: Add Items and Services in BoQ Budget Calculation

seg-source.mrk: Add Items and Services in BoQ Budget Calculation

trans-unit.source: As previously mentioned, any data entered in the Fast Calculation and/or updated in the BoQ Position List is transferred to the BoQ Budget Calculation.

seg-source.mrk: As previously mentioned, any data entered in the Fast Calculation and/or updated in the BoQ Position List is transferred to the BoQ Budget Calculation.

trans-unit.source: : BoQ Budget Calculation with data from Fast Calculation

seg-source.mrk: : BoQ Budget Calculation with data from Fast Calculation

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:xref href="#BoQBudgFast" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 2</MadCap:xref> shows that the entries made for wages and materials in the Fast Calculation for positions 3. 1. 10. and 3. 1. 20. have been created as separate general component lines in the BoQ Budget Calculation.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:xref href="#BoQBudgFast" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 2</MadCap:xref> shows that the entries made for wages and materials in the Fast Calculation for positions 3.
and 3.
have been created as separate general component lines in the BoQ Budget Calculation.

trans-unit.source: Actual services and items that are known during the quoting process can be entered in the BoQ Budget Calculation. These positions can then be copied to other positions in the calculation with the “Copy Calculation” function. Any services/items entered in the BoQ Budget Calculation will transfer to the PaC Job, which reduces data entry during the processing phase.

seg-source.mrk: Actual services and items that are known during the quoting process can be entered in the BoQ Budget Calculation.
These positions can then be copied to other positions in the calculation with the “Copy Calculation” function.
Any services/items entered in the BoQ Budget Calculation will transfer to the PaC Job, which reduces data entry during the processing phase.

trans-unit.source: New lines are created in the BoQ Budget Calculation just like in the Job Budget Calculation: select the position to add a line and then click New Level. In the Type field, enter Item or Service, in the No. field, enter the relevant Item or Resource, update quantities as needed and then enter any costs.

seg-source.mrk: New lines are created in the BoQ Budget Calculation just like in the Job Budget Calculation: select the position to add a line and then click New Level.
In the Type field, enter Item or Service, in the No.
field, enter the relevant Item or Resource, update quantities as needed and then enter any costs.

, quantities and cost fields.

trans-unit.source: Copy Calculations

seg-source.mrk: Copy Calculations

trans-unit.source: Calculations that have been added to positions can be copied to other positions in the BoQ Budget Calculation. This is useful when the same items and/or services are used in multiple positions.

seg-source.mrk: Calculations that have been added to positions can be copied to other positions in the BoQ Budget Calculation.
This is useful when the same items and/or services are used in multiple positions.

trans-unit.source: With the position line selected, click Actions > Copy Calculation. The BoQ Position List opens for selection of position(s) to copy the calculations.

seg-source.mrk: With the position line selected, click Actions > Copy Calculation.
The BoQ Position List opens for selection of position(s) to copy the calculations.

trans-unit.source: : BoQ Position List opened from Copy Calculation function

seg-source.mrk: : BoQ Position List opened from Copy Calculation function

trans-unit.source: In the BoQ Position List, select the position(s) in which to copy the calculations from the position selected in the BoQ Budget Calculation, and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: In the BoQ Position List, select the position(s) in which to copy the calculations from the position selected in the BoQ Budget Calculation, and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: : Selected positions to copy calculations from budget lines

seg-source.mrk: : Selected positions to copy calculations from budget lines

trans-unit.source: In the BoQ Budget Calculation, the positions selected in the BoQ Position List are updated with the calculations copied from the originating budget position.

trans-unit.source: Similar to the “Copy Calculation” function, one position can be copied to another position using the “Copy to” and “Paste from” functions.

seg-source.mrk: Similar to the “Copy Calculation” function, one position can be copied to another position using the “Copy to” and “Paste from” functions.

trans-unit.source: In the BoQ Budget Calculation, select the position to be copied and then click Actions > Copy to.

seg-source.mrk: In the BoQ Budget Calculation, select the position to be copied and then click Actions > Copy to.

seg-source.mrk: : Position to be copied to another position

trans-unit.source: Select the position where to copy the position and then on the Actions tab, click Create Structure > New Level.

seg-source.mrk: Select the position where to copy the position and then on the Actions tab, click Create Structure > New Level.

seg-source.mrk: : New level for pasting position

trans-unit.source: Select the new level position and then on the Actions tab, click Paste from. The copied position is pasted below the selected position.

seg-source.mrk: Select the new level position and then on the Actions tab, click Paste from.
The copied position is pasted below the selected position.

trans-unit.source: Change Wage Group

seg-source.mrk: Change Wage Group

trans-unit.source: Wage Groups can be changed on positions using the Wage Group Change function, which swaps service components and work types or changes the average calculation wage for a title, subtitle, position or the complete BoQ.

seg-source.mrk: Wage Groups can be changed on positions using the Wage Group Change function, which swaps service components and work types or changes the average calculation wage for a title, subtitle, position or the complete BoQ.

trans-unit.source: A new service calculation is added to a position in the BoQ Budget Calculation.

seg-source.mrk: A new service calculation is added to a position in the BoQ Budget Calculation.

trans-unit.source: : Service added to position

seg-source.mrk: : Service added to position

trans-unit.source: All new entries that have not been set with a calculation status of Calculated are selected and the “Change Calculation Status” function is run. Once finished, click Actions > Wage Group Change to open the Wage Group Change page.

seg-source.mrk: All new entries that have not been set with a calculation status of Calculated are selected and the “Change Calculation Status” function is run.
Once finished, click Actions > Wage Group Change to open the Wage Group Change page.

trans-unit.source: : Wage Group Change page

seg-source.mrk: : Wage Group Change page

trans-unit.source: The fields in the Wage Group Change page are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: BoQ Pos. No.

seg-source.mrk: BoQ Pos.
No.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the BoQ Position No. to be included in the Wage Group change.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the BoQ Position No.
to be included in the Wage Group change.

trans-unit.source: Complete BoQ

seg-source.mrk: Complete BoQ

trans-unit.source: If selected, all positions in the BoQ are to be included in the Wage Group change.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, all positions in the BoQ are to be included in the Wage Group change.

trans-unit.source: Calculate Fixed BoQ Positions

seg-source.mrk: Calculate Fixed BoQ Positions

trans-unit.source: If selected, BoQ Positions that are set as Fixed will be included in the Wage Group change.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, BoQ Positions that are set as Fixed will be included in the Wage Group change.

trans-unit.source: Extra Charge %

seg-source.mrk: Extra Charge %

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to update the Extra Charge % field in the BoQ Budget Calculation. The options are:

The options are:

trans-unit.source: Avg. Wage (h)

seg-source.mrk: Avg.
Wage (h)

trans-unit.source: Displays the average wage (in hours) for the selected position(s).

seg-source.mrk: Avg.
Wage (h) (New)

trans-unit.source: Specifies the new average wage (in hours) to be used for the wage change.

seg-source.mrk: Calc.
Res.
No.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Calculation Resource to be changed.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the Calculation Resource to be changed.

seg-source.mrk: Calc.
Res.
No.
(New)

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Calculation Resource to replace the current Calculation Resource during the Wage Group change.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the new Work Type to be added to the Calculation Resource during the Wage Group change, if necessary.

trans-unit.source: In the BoQ Position No. field, the main position for the new calculations is selected from the BoQ Position List; the Complete BoQ check box is automatically cleared.

seg-source.mrk: In the BoQ Position No.
field, the main position for the new calculations is selected from the BoQ Position List; the Complete BoQ check box is automatically cleared.

trans-unit.source: In the Extra Charge % field, the Find (Calculate Unit Price) option is selected to update the Extra Charge % field from the Job Calculation Group page, which recalculates the Unit Price based on Unit Cost + the new Extra Charge %.

seg-source.mrk: In the Extra Charge % field, the Find (Calculate Unit Price) option is selected to update the Extra Charge % field from the Job Calculation Group page, which recalculates the Unit Price based on Unit Cost + the new Extra Charge %.

trans-unit.source: In the Calc. Res. No. field, the service to change is selected from the Resource List, which is filtered by only the resources included within the BoQ Position.

Res.
No.
field, the service to change is selected from the Resource List, which is filtered by only the resources included within the BoQ Position.

Res.
No.
(New) field, the new resource is selected from the Resource List, which now displays all service resources.

is changed from S005 to S007.

trans-unit.source: Create Sales Quote

seg-source.mrk: Create Sales Quote

trans-unit.source: Now that calculations have been added to some positions in the BoQ Budget Calculation, a Sales Quote can be created.

seg-source.mrk: Now that calculations have been added to some positions in the BoQ Budget Calculation, a Sales Quote can be created.

trans-unit.source: On the Home tab, click Create Sales Quote.

seg-source.mrk: On the Home tab, click Create Sales Quote.

trans-unit.source: : Creating a sales quote from the BoQ Budget Calculation

seg-source.mrk: : Creating a sales quote from the BoQ Budget Calculation

trans-unit.source: In the dialog, select All positions without components to omit internal calculation components in the Sales Quote, and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: In the dialog, select All positions without components to omit internal calculation components in the Sales Quote, and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: A message appears asking to budget all sales positions; click No to have the ability to use the "Wage Group Change" or "Vernier Adjustment" functions later in the calculation process.

The Calculation Statistics page opens, displaying total values as well as values for the selected position.

seg-source.mrk: Each is described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

trans-unit.source: BoQ Positions (Open/In Progress)

seg-source.mrk: BoQ Positions (Open/In Progress)

trans-unit.source: Displays the number of BoQ positions for the total job budget and/or for the selected position that have a Calculation Status = Empty or Progress.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the number of BoQ positions for the total job budget and/or for the selected position that have a Calculation Status = Empty or Progress.

trans-unit.source: BoQ Positions (Calculated/Fixed)

seg-source.mrk: BoQ Positions (Calculated/Fixed)

trans-unit.source: Displays the number of BoQ positions for the total job budget and/or for the selected position that have a Calculation Status = Calculated or Fixed.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the number of BoQ positions for the total job budget and/or for the selected position that have a Calculation Status = Calculated or Fixed.

trans-unit.source: BoQ Positions (Fixed)

seg-source.mrk: BoQ Positions (Fixed)

trans-unit.source: Displays the number of BoQ positions for the total job budget and/or for the selected position that have a Calculation Status = Fixed.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the number of BoQ positions for the total job budget and/or for the selected position that have a Calculation Status = Fixed.

seg-source.mrk: Wage Hours Calculated

trans-unit.source: Displays the number of wage hours for the total job budget and/or for the selected position.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the number of wage hours for the total job budget and/or for the selected position.

trans-unit.source: Displays the number of wage days for the total job budget and/or for the selected position.

trans-unit.source: Average Wage

seg-source.mrk: Average Wage

trans-unit.source: Displays the average wage for the total job budget and/or for the selected position.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the average wage for the total job budget and/or for the selected position.

trans-unit.source: Calculation Group Filter Total / Calculation Group Filter Position

seg-source.mrk: Calculation Group Filter Total / Calculation Group Filter Position

trans-unit.source: Filters the values for the total job budget and/or selected position by a Calculation Group.

seg-source.mrk: Filters the values for the total job budget and/or selected position by a Calculation Group.

trans-unit.source: : Calculation Group Wages opened for Total Wage Hours Calculated

seg-source.mrk: : Calculation Group Wages opened for Total Wage Hours Calculated

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon of the Calculation Statistics page, click Init Preview. This transfers preview values to the Total (Preview) and Position (Preview) FastTabs, which had no values until the function was run.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon of the Calculation Statistics page, click Init Preview.
This transfers preview values to the Total (Preview) and Position (Preview) FastTabs, which had no values until the function was run.

trans-unit.source: : Populated Total (Preview) and Position (Preview) FastTabs

seg-source.mrk: : Populated Total (Preview) and Position (Preview) FastTabs

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the “Edit Vernier Adjustment Total”, “Edit Vernier Adjustment Position” and “Transfer Preview” functions become available on the ribbon after the “Init Preview” function is run.

seg-source.mrk: Additionally, the “Edit Vernier Adjustment Total”, “Edit Vernier Adjustment Position” and “Transfer Preview” functions become available on the ribbon after the “Init Preview” function is run.

trans-unit.source: Click Edit Vernier Adjustment Total to make temporary changes in the Calculation Statistics, not directly in the BoQ Budget Calculation. This page is used for trying different calculations without affecting the actual budget calculation. New calculations that are beneficial to the bid can be transferred to the BoQ Budget Calculation.

seg-source.mrk: Click Edit Vernier Adjustment Total to make temporary changes in the Calculation Statistics, not directly in the BoQ Budget Calculation.
This page is used for trying different calculations without affecting the actual budget calculation.
New calculations that are beneficial to the bid can be transferred to the BoQ Budget Calculation.

trans-unit.source: : Vernier Adjustment Edit Values

seg-source.mrk: : Vernier Adjustment Edit Values

trans-unit.source: The Vernier Adjustment Edit Values page contains basically the same information in all FastTabs, with the Total (External) FastTab containing a few extra fields. This page provides the ability to change average Line Discount %, Line Discount Amount and Target Price for the entire job, or average Extra Charge % and Line Discount % on individual components (Wages, Materials, External Service, Equipment, Others) for the entire job.

seg-source.mrk: The Vernier Adjustment Edit Values page contains basically the same information in all FastTabs, with the Total (External) FastTab containing a few extra fields.

This page provides the ability to change average Line Discount %, Line Discount Amount and Target Price for the entire job, or average Extra Charge % and Line Discount % on individual components (Wages, Materials, External Service, Equipment, Others) for the entire job.

trans-unit.source: For example, to change the average Extra Charge % for Wages from 20.00 to 23.00, enter 23 in the Extra Charge % (Average) field in the Wages FastTab. Leaving the field prompts a message regarding transferring values to positions.

seg-source.mrk: For example, to change the average Extra Charge % for Wages from 20.00 to 23.00, enter 23 in the Extra Charge % (Average) field in the Wages FastTab.
Leaving the field prompts a message regarding transferring values to positions.

trans-unit.source: : Changing average Extra Charge % for Wages

seg-source.mrk: : Changing average Extra Charge % for Wages

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to transfer the changes or No to stop the process. If Yes is selected, values are updated in the Vernier Adjustment Edit Values page.

seg-source.mrk: Click Yes to transfer the changes or No to stop the process.
If Yes is selected, values are updated in the Vernier Adjustment Edit Values page.

trans-unit.source: : Updated values after Extra Charge % change for wages

seg-source.mrk: : Updated values after Extra Charge % change for wages

trans-unit.source: Close the Vernier Adjustment Edit Values page to return to the Calculation Statistics page, which has been updated with changes.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Vernier Adjustment Edit Values page to return to the Calculation Statistics page, which has been updated with changes.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: Vernier Adjustments can be made for specific positions using the same process with the “Edit Vernier Adjustment Position” function.

seg-source.mrk: Vernier Adjustments can be made for specific positions using the same process with the “Edit Vernier Adjustment Position” function.

trans-unit.source: In the Calculation Statistics page, click Transfer Values to transfer all changes to the BoQ Budget Calculation.

seg-source.mrk: In the Calculation Statistics page, click Transfer Values to transfer all changes to the BoQ Budget Calculation.

trans-unit.source: : Values updated in Calculation Statistics

seg-source.mrk: : Values updated in Calculation Statistics

trans-unit.source: A message appears asking to transfer the preview values. Click Yes to transfer the values to the BoQ Budget Calculation, click No to cancel the transfer.

seg-source.mrk: A message appears asking to transfer the preview values.
Click Yes to transfer the values to the BoQ Budget Calculation, click No to cancel the transfer.

trans-unit.source: The Total (Preview) and Position (Preview) FastTabs are cleared.

seg-source.mrk: The Total (Preview) and Position (Preview) FastTabs are cleared.

trans-unit.source: : Cleared preview FastTabs in Calculation Statistics

seg-source.mrk: : Cleared preview FastTabs in Calculation Statistics

trans-unit.source: Values in the Total and Position FastTabs are updated with information from the BoQ Budget Calculation.

seg-source.mrk: Values in the Total and Position FastTabs are updated with information from the BoQ Budget Calculation.

trans-unit.source: : Updated values in Total and Position FastTabs

seg-source.mrk: : Updated values in Total and Position FastTabs

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: To restart the Vernier Adjustment process, click Refresh Statistics.

seg-source.mrk: To restart the Vernier Adjustment process, click Refresh Statistics.

trans-unit.source: Escape back to the BoQ Budget Calculation page.

seg-source.mrk: Escape back to the BoQ Budget Calculation page.

trans-unit.source: : BoQ Budget Calculation with Vernier adjustments

seg-source.mrk: : BoQ Budget Calculation with Vernier adjustments
